gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pistons 107, Mavericks 89
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pistons defeated the Mavericks, 107-89. Marcus Sasser recorded 24 points, three rebounds, and three assists for the Pistons, while Evan Fournier added 13 points, four rebounds, and two assists in the victory. Jaden Hardy tallied 25 points, seven rebounds, and two assists for the Mavericks in the losing effort. The Pistons improve to 14-67, while the Mavericks fall to 50-31.
